text: James Albert "Jim" Varney (June 15, 1949 - February 10, 2000) was an American actor and comedian. He was born and raised in Lexington, Kentucky. Varney is best remembered for his role as Ernest P. Worrell in many movies and television programs. He died of lung cancer in White House, Tennessee. == Filmography == ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 1982 Spittin' Image Sheriff 1983 Knowhutimean? Hey Vern, It's My Family Album Ernest P.
